fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may expend 1 power to change your state (Off/On).
- At night, if you are On, you must choose a player to rampage at.
- At night, while Off, you can choose a player to perform Machine Learning on, learning their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You begin Off. You appear innocent while Off, and appear suspicious while On.
- While Off you regenerate one power at the start of each night if you have less than 5 power.
- While On, you will attack all your visitors if you are roleblocked or controlled and clean them.
- While On, you consume 1 power at the start of each night.
- You begin with 1 Power
- If you have no power you turn off (without using power) and permanently lose basic defense

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill everyone who opposes the peasants.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
